title: Caribbean chicken and pumpkin curry
description: If you have time to leave the chicken overnight to marinate, it will really benefit from it.
ingredients: 8 bone-in chicken thighs, skinned, or a jointed chicken, skinned
2 scotch bonnet chillies (or according to taste), seeds removed, finely chopped
2 tbsp medium curry powder blend, preferably Caribbean
salt and freshly ground black pepper
